snippet: With the choice of Paul D. Ryan to be the Republican vice- presidential nominee, not one person in a group of top political jobs - the presidential and vice-presidential nominees of both parties, the Supreme Court justices, the speaker of the House...
abstract: With the choice of Paul D. Ryan to be the Republican vice- presidential nominee, not one person in a group of top political jobs - the presidential and vice-presidential nominees of both parties, the Supreme Court justices, the speaker of the House or the Senate majority leader - is a white Protestant.

byline.original: By DAVID LEONHARDT, ALICIA PARLAPIANO and LISA WAANANEN

headline.main: A Historical Benchmark for Religion and Race
